Package application

Class Reversi

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
application.Reversi
public class Reversi
extends javafx.application.Application
This class is an implementation of the board game reversi contains the main menu and the all the game mechanics of the game
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Nagy

    • checkForNextPiecePosition

      public boolean checkForNextPiecePosition​(int x, int y, Tile[][] board, PieceType whosTurn)
      This method checks if there is a piece with a specific color on the tile
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the tested tile
      y - y coordinate of the tested tile
      board - the board where the testing is made
      whosTurn - The color which is tested
      Returns:
      If there is a piece with the right color on the tile

    • flipPieces

      public int flipPieces​(int x, int y, int xChange, int yChage, boolean test, Tile[][] board, PieceType whosTurn)
      This method makes the checks for the flipping of the pieces
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the last placed piece
      y - The y coordinate of the last placed piece
      xChange - The change in x for the direction to check
      yChage - The change in y for the direction to check
      test - If the flipping is a test move or not
      board - The board where the pieces are turned
      whosTurn - The color which made the last move
      Returns:
      The number of pieces flipped

    • flip

      public int flip​(int xcoordinate, int ycoordinate, boolean test, Tile[][] board, PieceType whoisnext)
      This method calls flipPieces horizontally vertically diagonally
      Parameters:
      xcoordinate - This is the x coordinate of the placed piece
      ycoordinate - This is the y coordinate of the placed piece
      test - This is for testing if piece is placed would it flip any other piece
      board - This is the board where the pieces will be flipped
      whoisnext - This is the player who placed the piece
      Returns:
      The number of pieces flipped with the move

    • validMove

      public boolean validMove​(int x, int y, Tile[][] board, PieceType whosTurn)
      This method checks if a moved is valid or not
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the tested move
      y - The y coordinate of the tested move
      board - The board where the move is tested
      whosTurn - The player who makes the move
      Returns:
      The possibility of the move

      Parameters:

      whosTurn - The player who makes the move
